headline: Capital One (COF): Revisiting Valuation After a Strong Year-to-Date Share Price Rally
summary: Capital One Financial (COF) has quietly added to its gains, with the stock up about 6% over the past month and nearly 29% this year, as investors reassess its earnings power. See our latest analysis for Capital One Financial. That strength has come as investors warm to improving credit trends and resilient consumer spending, lifting the share price to around $230.59 and supporting strong total shareholder returns over three and five years. This suggests momentum is still building rather than...
